00003 <h3>Install</h3>
00004 <p>
00005         Download the ZIP archive containing the widget, unzip it by double-clicking it (or using an application of your choice),
00006         then double-click the widget to open it in Dashboard, or copy it to the folder <code>~/Library/Widgets</code>.
00007 </p>
00008 <p>
00009         Safari users will be prompted to automatically install the widget after downloading.
